column5: 350 acres of Texas ranch heaven! Spread out in this 5/4 4,000 foot ranch house or hang out on the 2,000 foot covered porch complete with outdoor patio fireplace. The kids can escape through the wardrobe into the secret Narnia room where three levels of bunks and terraces are connected by ladders and walkways. The 7 acre pond is perfectly stocked with prize sized large mouth bass, bluegill, and catfish. This is the perfect place for that weekend getaway or Central Texas reunion!
column8: Escape to enchanted Baines Creek Ranch!
